plot: Luis Camus is a confident journalist, but the arrival of a news that escapes from everything he knows will make him start to doubt their ethics and those in which he trusts.
title: Me llaman Búho
plot_es: Luis Camus is a confident journalist, but the arrival of a news that escapes from everything he knows will make him start to doubt their ethics and those in which he trusts.
plot_en: Luis Camus is a confident journalist, but the arrival of a news that escapes from everything he knows will make him start to doubt their ethics and those in which he trusts.
